verses.text: Shortly \w before|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H5927"\w* Elijah \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w whirlwind|strong="H5591"\w*, Elijah \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Elisha \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* Elijah said \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H3427"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*.” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H3427"\w* replied, “\w As|strong="H5704"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5315"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.” \w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w came|strong="H5066"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Elisha \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said, “\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* master \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*?” “\w Yes|strong="H3588"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* replied. “\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* speak \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Elijah said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H3427"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H3427"\w* replied, “\w As|strong="H5315"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5315"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.” \w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8147"\w* Elijah \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* cloak, \w rolled|strong="H5674"\w* \w it|strong="H5221"\w* \w up|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w parted|strong="H2673"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* right \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w left|strong="H5674"\w*, \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w dry|strong="H2724"\w* \w ground|strong="H2724"\w*.

\w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H2962"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, Elijah \w said|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Elisha, “\w Tell|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H2962"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w before|strong="H2962"\w* \w I|strong="H2962"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w*?” “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w*, \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* inherit \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w double|strong="H8147"\w* \w portion|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*,” Elisha replied.

“\w You|strong="H3947"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w requested|strong="H7592"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w difficult|strong="H7185"\w* \w thing|strong="H7185"\w*,” \w said|strong="H3651"\w* Elijah. “\w Nevertheless|strong="H3651"\w*, \w if|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w*, \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* yours. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*.”

\w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \w along|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w talking|strong="H1696"\w* \w together|strong="H8147"\w*, \w suddenly|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \w of|strong="H7393"\w* fire \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w of|strong="H7393"\w* fire \w appeared|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w separated|strong="H6504"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H7393"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w whirlwind|strong="H5591"\w*.

\w As|strong="H2388"\w* Elisha \w watched|strong="H7200"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w out|strong="H2388"\w*, “\w My|strong="H7200"\w* father, \w my|strong="H7200"\w* father, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* \w of|strong="H7393"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*!” \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* Elijah \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*. \w So|strong="H3808"\w* taking \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H7393"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w own|strong="H2388"\w* clothes, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w tore|strong="H7167"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w*.

\w Elisha|strong="H7725"\w* also \w picked|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cloak \w that|strong="H5307"\w* had \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* Elijah, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w went|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cloak \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Elijah \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*. “\w Where|strong="H5921"\w* \w now|strong="H2008"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Elijah?” \w he|strong="H1931"\w* asked. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w parted|strong="H2673"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w left|strong="H5674"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Elisha \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* watching \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H7200"\w* \w had|strong="H1121"\w* happened, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* said, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elijah \w rests|strong="H5117"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* Elisha.” \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w went|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ground \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

“\w Look|strong="H2009"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Elisha, “\w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*. \w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w search|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* master. \w Perhaps|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w valleys|strong="H1516"\w*.” “\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*,” Elisha replied.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w pressed|strong="H6484"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w point|strong="H5704"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* embarrassment, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* said, “\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*.” \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* men, \w who|strong="H4672"\w* \w searched|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* Elijah.

\w When|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H7725"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w staying|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* said \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*, “Didn’t \w I|strong="H3808"\w* tell \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w men|strong="H7451"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* said \w to|strong="H4325"\w* Elisha, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w note|strong="H2009"\w*, \w our|strong="H7200"\w* lord, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*’s \w location|strong="H4186"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w as|strong="H5892"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w* \w can|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*. \w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w bad|strong="H7451"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w unfruitful|strong="H7921"\w*.”

“\w Bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* bowl,” \w he|strong="H8033"\w* replied, “\w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w some|strong="H8033"\w* \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w in|strong="H8033"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H8033"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w*,
